'bb9235d3-9422-46ac-a1cd-5f7fff56c032'::uuid, '{Portal Name} members can apply for FREE support to improve their skills and knowledge through the {Program Name}.', true), ('5287a015-0d96-40e4-8308-12ff6ad83f8f'::uuid, 'admin@localhost.com', '2024-11-11 03:45:08.432', 'admin@localhost.com', '2024-11-11 03:45:08.432', '69b743f9-27f3-4b05-b02c-942ee007955f'::uuid, 'The {Portal Name} brings multiple services for small businesses into a single network for entrepreneurs...', true), ('8caa3b1b-5d74-4523-9198-f41799a82e42'::uuid, 'admin@localhost.com', '2024-11-11 03:45:08.432', 'admin@localhost.com', '2024-11-11 03:45:08.432', 'a10d4593-4acf-42df-8175-fa3c9f6f833c'::uuid, '

How do I apply?

  1. Make sure you have a {Portal Name} account (if not, sign up here)
  2. Submit your application by clicking the button below.

Questions?

Please contact {Portal Primary Contact Name}.

{Portal Primary Contact Email}

{Portal Primary Contact Phone}

', true), ('631c2153-dbee-4987-b3c7-8d9156934872'::uuid, 'admin@localhost.com', '2024-11-11 03:45:08.432', 'admin@localhost.com', '2024-11-11 03:45:08.432', '4d9f5e6a-56f6-41b8-8b79-8ca62993e63d'::uuid, null, true), ('79d10eb8-e8d7-466f-a134-06494bc561f9'::uuid, 'admin@localhost.com', '2024-11-11 03:45:08.432', 'admin@localhost.com', '2024-11-11 03:45:08.432', 'f78c82fd-4cd0-40d0-92e6-00d5035e4941'::uuid, '

- Do I need to be a {Portal Name} Member?

Yes - to access 1-on-1 services you must create a free account.

- What are the eligibility requirements?

You must be a resident or own/operate a business in {City/Region}.

- Do I need a business license?

Yes - you must have a valid business license to receive 1-on-1 support.

- Support is on a first-come, first-served basis

- Priority is given to first-time applicants.

- Businesses must get started within 10 business days of approval.

- All support must be used within 90 days of approval.

', true);
